translation.ja: その通り　君が１週間で 成したことは大きい

translation.en: We're back on the map again.
They'll stop thinking of us as a Rust Belt backwater
translation.ja: スタジアム建設計画が 発表されたら― 斜陽産業と沈滞地域の 汚名返上だ

translation.en: once they get an eyeful of that stadium plan.
translation.ja: 斜陽産業と沈滞地域の 汚名返上だ

translation.en: And we intend to get you everything you need to lay hands on those tournament rings.
translation.ja: チャンピオンリングの ためなら何でも調達する

translation.en: -  What he really means is that we're hitching all our wagons to your star, Coach French.
translation.ja: あなたが頂点に導くのを 期待してるの
プレッシャーに取らないで
ダイヤは圧力(プレッシャー)で作られる

translation.en: - All right, all right, Sutton Grove! - Ow!
So listen. Our football team, huh?
translation.ja: 我がフットボールチームは―

translation.en: Got the shit kicked out of them tonight...
When a lot of us went to school here, everything was football, right?
translation.ja: ここで育った僕らには フットボールが全てだった

translation.en: We thought it would be that way forever.
translation.ja: ずっと続くと思っていた

translation.en: We even had a plan to build a big, gleaming new stadium for our boys.
translation.ja: 見事なスタジアム建設の 計画もあった

translation.en: We had to put that dream on hold. We were struggling.
translation.ja: 景気が低迷し 夢は中断

translation.en: All right? Like so many American towns...
translation.ja: 同様の町がたくさんある

translation.en: Tonight, friends-- tonight, we witnessed a transformation.
translation.ja: 大きな変化を 今晩この目で見た

translation.en: We saw how good our girls could be.
translation.ja: あっぱれ チアリーダー

translation.en: We saw that they could take the lead.
translation.ja: 彼女たちが 引っ張っていくんだ

translation.en: G-- girls. You've seen the T- shirt. Come on, you guys.
translation.ja: Tシャツ見たことあるだろ

translation.en: Leaving me hanging up here. Now, listen.
Some people say cheer is not a sport.
translation.ja: チアリーディングはスポーツ でないと言う人がいる

translation.en: I think Coach French over here would disagree,
translation.ja: 同席のフレンチコーチは 反論するよ

translation.en: but I can tell you this:
It's an industry. It's the future.
And it is a future that is coming here to Sutton Grove.
translation.ja: 未来がサットン･グローブに やって来る

translation.en: Folks, a stadium can transform a town.
translation.ja: スタジアムが町を変える

translation.en: A stadium can heal a town.
translation.ja: スタジアムが町を再生する

translation.en: If we build this, they will come!
translation.ja: 作れば やって来る！

translation.en: When we have this stadium-- when we have this stadium,
translation.ja: このスタジアムができたら― スタジアムは町の道標になり 人を導き―
スタジアムは町の道標になり 人を導き―

translation.en: there is nothing we can't do.
translation.ja: 無限の可能性が生まれる
サットン･グローブが蘇る！

translation.en: - ♪ Like a mechanical bull ♪ - Why not?

translation.ja: ジョーディ･ジョーンズ！

translation.en: - ♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - Get in!
♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - You better have weed.
- Hey! Jailbait! Is that my phone?
translation.ja: よう 売春婦　それ俺のか？

translation.en: What else you got in that car?
The head push? You're pulling that shit on me?
- I just-- I-- I don't know what you want.
translation.ja: 君がどうしたいのか わからなくて…
ジョーディ･ジョーンズ

translation.en: Welcome to our nest of vipers.
translation.ja: マムシ集団にようこそ バートの部下なら承知よね

translation.en: But you're probably used to that, working for Bert.
translation.ja: バートの部下なら承知よね

translation.en: I'm the project manager for the new stadium.
translation.ja: スタジアム建設の プロジェクトマネージャーで

translation.en: What I don't know is which one of you he had his eyes on first.
translation.ja: わからないのは…バートが どちらに目をつけたのか
わからないのは…バートが どちらに目をつけたのか 何と？

translation.en: - Well, he's had his sights trained on your wife
translation.ja: ジェフ･イースト校が 州大会出場以来―

translation.en: since she took Jeff East to state.
translation.ja: 奥さんにずっと照準を 合わせてた

translation.en: We just never thought we could land her.
translation.ja: 絶対無理だと思ってたわ

translation.en: Never say Bert Cassidy doesn't know how to sweeten a deal.
translation.ja: バート･キャシディは 交渉上手ね
やあ 堂々とお出ましか　来いよ

translation.en: - Oh, had to make a grand entrance, huh?
translation.ja: 堂々とお出ましか　来いよ

translation.en: - Guess I missed a lot. - Hey.
translation.ja: 盛り上がっているようで

translation.en: - How was, uh-- how was the game?
- Oh, not bad. Uh, Mr. Cassidy has two daughters on the squad--
translation.ja: まあまあ　キャシディさんの 二人のお嬢さん…

translation.en: - The little one stole the show.
translation.ja: チビがショーを一人占めだ

translation.en: People always say to me, Bert, I bet you wish you had sons.
translation.ja: “息子が欲しかったろう”と 言われるが―

translation.en: You know what I say to them? Fuck that old news.
translation.ja: 時代遅れもいいとこだ

translation.en: I mean, right? Look at my girls.

translation.ja: エネルギーと自信と ガッツがある

translation.en: - Yes, well, getting any of them to actually work is the hard part.
translation.ja: 努力させるのが一苦労

translation.en: - It took me a while too. Matt helped me with that.
translation.ja: 私もそうだった マットのおかげよ

translation.en: I don't know where I would be without him.
translation.ja: 彼なしだったら 今どこにいたか

translation.en: I didn't realize you followed Colette's career so closely.
translation.ja: コレットの業績を詳しく フォローしてたとは初耳です
コレットの業績を詳しく フォローしてたとは初耳です 僕は勝者を追っかけて買う
僕は勝者を追っかけて買う

translation.en: We've had this date together from the beginning-- all three of us.
translation.ja: 最初から僕ら３人は ここにいることになっていた

translation.en: You look great. It's good to see you.
I'm glad you could-- Bill. - Thanks. - Come over here. I wanted to--

translation.ja: 友達の言うこと聞けよ

translation.en: - Let's just go, okay? You and me.
Let's go down to the factory and break some windows and go crazy.
translation.ja: 工場の窓をぶち壊して 暴れようよ

translation.en: - She gonna get into trouble with your coach?
translation.ja: コーチと揉めるのかな？

translation.en: No one's gonna say anything. I won't let them.
translation.ja: 口止めする　絶対に

translation.en: - Well, she's lucky to have you.
translation.ja: いい友達を持って幸せだ

translation.en: had eyes in the back of his head.
translation.ja: すべてお見通しだった
選手だったの？ 大昔ね

translation.en: And you never get it back.
- It turns out you were right.

translation.ja: アディはいい人だから―

translation.en: You don't know how it works.
People like that, they throw you away.
translation.ja: ああいう人間は簡単に捨てる

translation.en: - ♪ I hope that our memories stay ♪
- You're still my girl, right, Addy?
translation.ja: 今でも私のアディよね？

translation.en: I must have left it up at Lanvers.
translation.ja: ランヴァーズに 置いてきたんだ
コーチがかつて言った

translation.en: Someday, you're gonna really want something.
translation.ja: “いつかあるものが 無性に欲しくなる”

translation.en: That's when you'll find out who you are.
translation.ja: “その時本当の 自分がわかる”

translation.en: - But there's a price for everything.
You have to give up the old things...
This is how you become strong.
This is how you become a woman.
- Beth! Hey! We're not saying anything.
